metadata.label: Physical description
metadata.value: Number of Images: 1; Color: Black and white; Size: 9 3/4w x 7 3/4h; Type of Image: Person, candid; Medium: Photographic print

metadata.label: Summary
metadata.value: Elaine R. S. Hodges combined art with science in her meticulous drawings of insects and other organisms as a scientific illustrator at the Smithsonian's National Museum of Natural History. In this photo, she holds in her hand "The Guild Handbook of Scientific Illustration," for which she was the editor.

metadata.label: Contained within
metadata.value: Smithsonian Institution Archives, Record Unit 98-015, Box 2, Folder April 1989
